FCLib API

Collaboration diagram for FCLib API:

Detailed Description

Feature Characterization Library.

Description:

Collection of data structures and routines for post-processing data analysis of simulation datasets. The focus is on characterizing features.


Modules

 Data Types
 Data types of the library.
 Simple Data Objects
 Simple Data Objects.
 Data Interface
 Primary interface between computational routines and actual data.
 Utilities
 Support routines.
 Error Handling
 Data structures and routines to ease error handling.
 Geometric Relations
 Relationships and values which depend on the coordinates in space.
 Topological Relations
 Relationships between elements and vertices of the mesh.
 Variable Math
 Mathematic operations on and between variables.
 Statistics Routines
 These routines compute simple statistical values of the data variables.
 Series Routines
 Sequence-based analysis routines (e.g., time series) and helper functions.
 Threshold
 Apply thresholds to variables.
 Shape
 Information about Shapes.
 Element Death
 Dead element analysis routines and helper functions.
 Features
 Basic feature data structures and routines for manipulating them.
 Feature Tracking
 Routines for assembling Regions Of Interest into Features.
 Sierra
 Data structures and routines for dealing with Sierra generated data.
 Custom
 Sandbox for trying out new stuff.
